description:
Capture all the diamonds on each level to make the rainbow generator work again.

Dodge the obstacles and jump over the enemies to kill them.

Collect as many power balls as you can to increase your speed and jump power.

Replay levels to improve your time record.

This game a 2D lateral scroll platformer. Its main features are:
 - 40 levels
 - 4 different planets (10 levels per planet)
 - Enemies
 - Power Ups
 - Spikes!
 - Time record for each level
 - CRT filter effect (optional)

Graphics, sounds and the game itself have been created by a solo developer.
name: Rainbow Diamonds
intro: Travel the galaxy in this pixelated 2D adventure
